metadata.title: CVE-2017-14731 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: ofx_proc_file in ofx_preproc.cpp in LibOFX 0.9.12 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and applicationcrash) via a crafted file, as demonstrated by an ofxdump call.

criterions.comment: libofx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
